content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ModelStorage;
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ModelStorage
WITH
( LOCATION = 'wasbs://models@uiapsynapsedl.blob.core.windows.net'
, CREDENTIAL = AzureStorageAccountKey
, TYPE = HADOOP
);

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv;

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv
WITH (
FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
FORMAT_OPTIONS (
FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
STRING_DELIMITER = '',
DATE_FORMAT = '',
USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = False
)
);

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[MLModelExt]') IS NOT NULL  
DROP TABLE [dbo].[MLModelExt] 

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[MLModelExt]
(
[Model] [varbinary](max) NULL
)
WITH
(
LOCATION='/hex' ,
DATA_SOURCE = ModelStorage ,
FILE_FORMAT = csv ,
REJECT_TYPE = VALUE ,
REJECT_VALUE = 0
)
GO

-- Verify access by running query
--SELECT Model, 'A simple model.'
--FROM dbo.MLModelExt

IF OBJECT_ID('[dbo].[MLModel_Automated]') IS NOT NULL  
DROP TABLE [dbo].[MLModel_Automated] 


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MLModel_Automated]
(
[Id] [int] NOT NULL,
[Model] [varbinary](max) NULL,
[Description] [varchar](200) NULL
)
WITH
(
DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
heap
)
GO
